name: Tosser (Kenneth Khau)
description:
A 2D Resource Management Platformer where you ride in a tank. It is your job to keep the tank safe from hostile obstacles threatening you from your destination. Not only will you have to defend the tank, you must keep your vehicle fueled and loaded less you find yourself stranded and unarmed.

Credits

GAME DESIGN & PROGRAMMING
Kenneth Khau

SOUND DESIGN
Greg Levinson
Franco Addante

ARTISTS
Johnny Bell

Art unlisted belongs to their respective owners

Controls

PC:

In Tank:
Movement - A & D
Grab/Throw Objects -  Left Mouse
Jump - Space
Interact with controls - E 

On Cannon:
Raise/Lower Cannon - A & D
Fire Cannon -  Left Mouse
Leave Controls - E

Xbox:

In Tank:
Movement - Left Control Stick
Grab/Throw Objects -  X
Jump - A
Interact with controls - Y 

On Cannon:
Raise/Lower Cannon - Left Control Stick
Fire Cannon -  X
Leave Controls - Y
